relevant_findings.CV: regular rate and rhythm without murmurs/gallops/rubs
relevant_findings.Abdomen: gravid, soft, tender with light palpation of lower sternum to epigastric area, not worse with deep palpation, no rebound or guarding
relevant_findings.Back: tender/sore right mid with no costovertebral angle tenderness

Ultrasound.Liver: 2.2 x 2.0 cm slightly echogenic mass in the right hepatic lobe, slightly larger than the previous measurement of 1.7 x 1.7 cm; remaining hepatic parenchyma within normal limits with a smooth contour
Ultrasound.Bile Ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation, CBD measures 4 mm
Ultrasound.Gallbladder: No evidence of stones or gallbladder wall thickening; 1.5 cm stone identified likely within cystic duct, previously seen in body of the gallbladder
Ultrasound.Pancreas: Within normal limits without masses or ductal dilation
Ultrasound.Kidneys: Right kidney measures 12.2 cm, left kidney not evaluated

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initial lesion size increased; second lesion previously seen not detected in the current study
